Arithletics Academy cares about your child's quick, comprehensive and balanced intellectual growth

  • The world famous method of Mental Arithmetic is used as the main tool of intellectual abilities development and as the index of child's further success
  • Classes are conducted by experienced teachers who are trained and certified according to international Mental Arithmetic program standarts
  • The program's main goal is the growth of a common intelligence and an equal development of both cerebral hemispheres
    • More details about Academy

Mental Arithmetic's method is verified by the the world's leading institutions

Perfect for children aged 4 - 14 years

This is the period of "brain plasticity", the most intensive development of the brain, the highest capacity for self-correction which helps students to study easier.

Various activities in this period stimulate brain function, promotes brain cells growth and formation of connections between them. The extensive development of mental activity at this age will affect your child's future life and future prospects.

  • Age difficulties

    Slow transition from visual actions to visual imagination. No ability to think logically. Low attention concentration

  • What will lessons bring?

    Quick and consistent thinking development. Patience and attention concentration are trained

  • Result

    UCMAS will prepare your child for entering the school. He or she will know the number and calculation. It will be easy for a child to attend lessons

  • Age difficulties

    Low cognitive motivation, low self-esteem.

  • What will lessons bring?

    Children learn how to learn, eye-memory is developing. Self-esteem get higher.

  • Result

    UCMAS delevops intellectual abilities and skills. It help to make better the results not only in math, but also in other subjects.

  • Age difficulties

    High level of irritability, dispersion, activity gets slower

  • What will lessons bring?

    Intellect development, higher level of motivation, the child becomes more attentive, which leads to better schooling results.

  • Result

    Results get much better and the child developes inlself in multiple spheres of lilfe. Skills, received in UCMAS, can be applied in everyday life.

We raise a little genius
You see the first result in three mounth

The acquisition of calculations skills
(addition, subtraction, multiplication and division, the calculation of square and cube roots of numbers)

Equal development of both cerebral
hemispheres

After the graduation form the 2nd level, the students already know the multiplication table be heart, and after graduationg the 10th - can extract roots in their heads

and use of brain potential
